scripts.start: npm run migrate && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.docker:verify: docker ps | grep playermarketstats || echo 'MySQL container not running. Run: npm run docker:up'
scripts.setup: npm run docker:up && npx wait-on tcp:localhost:3306 --timeout 30000 && npm run install:all
scripts.verify: npm run docker:verify && echo 'Checking Node version...' && node --version && echo 'Setup verification complete!'
